EU AI Act Implementation

This report provides an overview of the European Union's Artificial Intelligence (AI) Act, its implementation timeline, and the role of AI & Partners in defending digital rights. The report was prepared by Sean Donald John Musch and Michael Charles Borrelli.

Key Concepts:

  • Digital rights
  • Artificial intelligence
  • Regulatory interventions
